Title: Chapter VI: Hand of Five Poisons
Writer: Alfred Gough (created by), Miles Millar (created by), Alfred Gough, Miles Millar, Michael R. Perry
Actors: Daniel Wu, Orla Brady, Sarah Bolger, Aramis Knight
Plot: Sunny and M.K. fight to escape Quinn's grip once and for all, while the Baron's enemies conspire to take him down and change the Badlands forever.
